pr_title: DHFPROD-6138: Set columns for join table to nullable to avoid error w…

timeline.bodyText: Can you slim this down to the minimum needed to reproduce the problem? I'm guessing just the customerId and billing, and then you can drop Zip from Address? Or is Zip needed?
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: I adjusted the test to also check the single value join of address to zip.
replies.author: ryanjdew

timeline.message: DHFPROD-6138: Set columns for join table to nullable to avoid error with PII fields
